description.en:
A sweet romantic comedy about an overprotective marquis' son and a dense princess that continues from the previous life!

Princess Eliana has memories of a previous life in which she was in an unrequited love with her childhood friend. However, in this life, she is reunited with her former childhood friend, Albert, the son of a marquis. And he treats her like a sister again! Not wanting to make the same mistake, she struggles to marry someone other than Albert, but Albert's behavior begins to become strange.

"Who are you engaged to?"
"I don't want to give you to anyone else." 

...But I was the one who was dumped in the previous life, wasn't I?

description.en: The year is Meiji 17, 1884. The place, Tokyo. Genemon Sakuragi is searching for a "man of valor" according to his master’s order! One night, Genemon spots a mysterious young man fighting with three ruffians! Genemon is captivated by the Mysterious Punches of the young man, named Fuutaro Yukimura. What is this “martial art” that Fuutaro Yukimura uses so freely?! And what of the exhibition match that Marquis Tenzen Shibahara wishes to hold….?! What is the strongest weaponless martial art of Meiji Era Tokyo?! The curtain now rises on the martial arts conflict of the age…!!
description.pt-br: Ano de 1884, era Meiji. Genemon Sakuragi está procurando por um “homem de valor” de acordo com a ordem do seu mestre! Em uma noite, Genemon encontra um jovem lutando contra três valentões. Genemon ficou fascinado com os Socos Misteriosos desse jovem chamado Fuutaro Yukimura. O que é essa “arte marcial” que Fuutaro usa livremente?! E que tipo de partida de exibição esse Marquis Tenzen Shibahara quer fazer…?! Qual é a arte marcial desarmada mais poderosa de Tokio na Era Meiji?! Agora a cortina do conflito de artes marciais do século se abre!!!

description.en:
When the gorgeous Nanami Barato confesses to Yoshin Misumai, it seems too good to be true! Only, it is—and Yoshin knows it. How’s an introverted guy like him supposed to keep his cool when he knows this is all just a dare? Even more puzzling, despite her gaudy appearance, this supposed gyaru isn’t actually all that good with guys! Perhaps this is the perfect chance for this shy guy to pluck up his own courage and say yes to the guy-shy girl. So begins their new cushy life of morning meet-ups and handmade lunches. The thing is, judging by the way she’s acting, Nanami has fallen head over heels for him! From dares and dating to downright disasters, can these two first-timers figure out their feelings and maybe even fall in love—for real, this time?!

---

description.ja:
**陰キャ×清楚ギャル、罰ゲームから始まるピュアラブコメ!!**

クラス内カーストトップの清楚ギャル・茨戸七海に罰ゲームで告白されて付き合うことになった陰キャ男子・簾舞陽信。 しかし罰ゲームのはずが、七海は陽信にガチ惚れしているようで…？
description.pl: Kiedy piękna Nanami Barato wyznaje miłość Yoshinowi Misumai, wydaje się to zbyt piękne, by mogło być prawdziwe! Tylko, że tak jest - i Yoshin o tym wie. Jak taki introwertyczny facet jak on ma zachować zimną krew, skoro wie, że to tylko wyzwanie? Jeszcze bardziej zastanawiające jest to, że pomimo jej krzykliwego wyglądu, ta rzekoma gyaru nie jest tak dobra w kontaktach z facetami! Być może jest to idealna okazja dla tego nieśmiałego faceta, aby zebrać się na odwagę i powiedzieć "tak" tej nieśmiałej dziewczynie. Tak zaczyna się ich nowe, wygodne życie porannych spotkań i ręcznie robionych lunchów. Rzecz w tym, że sądząc po jej zachowaniu, Nanami zakochała się w nim po uszy! Czy ta dwójka może odkryć swoje uczucia, a może nawet zakochać się w sobie - tym razem naprawdę?!
description.pt-br: Barato Nanami, uma versão atenuada da garota no topo da hierarquia da escola, perdeu um jogo de cartas e agora tem que confessar a um cara de sua classe como punição. Misumai Youshin, que é um solitário sem amigos, foi o cara escolhido, mas ele sabe da punição! Deveria ter sido uma punição do jogo, mas será que Nanami vai desenvolver sentimentos por Youshin…?

description.en: Kotori-kun, who falls in love with his classmate Hiiragi-san at first sight, somehow wants to get close to her. Hiiragi-san is quite an earnest and lovely girl, but… She’s surprisingly a little careless--! This is about the charming school life of a careless girl and a pure boy who gets led on everyday by her -- a romantic comedy that’s a wee bit H sometimes but warm and fluffy to death.

Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

Konakai Futaba loves her older sister more than anything else in the world. Kind, beautiful and intelligent, Ichina was everything that Futaba wished that she could be… she even encouraged Futaba when she was feeling down.

description.en:
After having descended upon this world, the gods have created guilds where adventurers can test their mettle. These guilds, known as "familia," grant adventurers the chance to explore, gather, hunt, or simply enjoy themselves.  
Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka Gaiden: Sword Oratoria begins in Orario, the lively city of adventurers. The Sword Princess, Ais Wallenstein, and the novice mage, Lefiya Viridis, are members of the Loki Familia, who are experts at monster hunting. With the rest of their group, they journey to the tower of Babel in hopes of exploring the dungeon underneath. Home to powerful monsters, the dungeon will fulfill Ais's desire to master her sword skills, while bringing Lefiya closer to her dream of succeeding Riveria Ljos Alf, vice-captain of the Loki Familia, as the most powerful mage in the land.

description.en:
Bell Cranel is just trying to find his way in the world. Of course, in his case, the “world” is an enormous dungeon filled with monsters below a city run by gods and goddesses with way too much time on their hands. He’s got big dreams but not much more when a roll on the random encounter die brings him face-to-face with the girl of his dreams—but what’s an amateur adventurer got to offer a brilliant swords woman? And what if the lonely goddess who sponsors his solo adventuring gets jealous?

(Series was cancelled in 2018 for an unknown reason and restarted in 2020 under a sequel title.)

description.en: A poor high school boy, Izuki Tomonari, got caught up in a kidnapping attempt on Hinako Konohana, a young lady from one of Japan's largest conglomerates. On the surface, Hinako appears to be a brilliant and beautiful young woman, but in reality, she is a lazy girl with no life skills. However, due to family reasons, Hinako has to play the role of the "perfect young lady" at school. Wanting to protect her, Izuki took on the job of caring for her. Eventually, Hinako began to spoil Izuki with all her might. "I don't want... Izuki to leave my side right now." This is a love story that begins beyond the master-servant relationship featuring a princess with a beautiful facade.
description.pt-br: O estudante do ensino médio Itzuki Tomonari se envolveu em um sequestro e se viu lidando com Konohana Hinako, a herdeira do maior conglomerado do Japão. Hinako parece ser uma jovem inteligente e bonita, mas sua verdadeira identidade é preguiçosa, sem capacidade para viver sozinha. No entanto, devido às circunstâncias em casa, Hinako tem que interpretar a "ojou-sama perfeita" na academia. Uma história de amor que começa além de mestre-servo com uma linda jovem.

description.en: Aira Misono is a run-of-the-mill high school girl, and never imagined that she’d be summoned to another world, let alone declared its savior. Yet from the moment the handsome Prince Kyle lays eyes on her, he’s convinced that she’s the long-awaited Holy Saint destined to banish darkness from his world. Aira herself maintains significant doubts. Is she really up to this challenge? She might be able to use magic, but is she really a Saint? Aira’s fears and struggles only deepen when the woman summoned alongside her begins to look more and more like the one who truly deserves that title.

description.en:
Otaku Sakamichi Onoda has just entered high school and plans to join the anime club. In middle school, Onoda didn’t have any friends with whom he could talk about anime, games, Akihabara and other otaku things, and he is hoping he can make such friends in the anime club, but he finds out it's been disbanded. In order to reestablish the club he tries to find 4 other people who would like to join.  
  
Since he was a little boy, Onoda has ridden his mamachari–a bulky bicycle with a step-through frame mainly used for short rides, such as for casual fun or to pick up groceries–to go to Akihabara every week to check out or buy otaku things. Fellow freshman Shunsuke Imaizumi and bicyclist, while training, notices a boy (Onoda) riding his mamachari up a steep road.  
  
Freshman and road racing cyclist, Shokichi Naruko visits Akihabara to get some Gundam plastic models for his younger brothers and meets Onoda who catches his attention because of the his cycling skill on the mamachari and later find out they go to the same school. Later on, both Naruko and Imaizumi try to convince him to join the bicycle racing club, but will he?


---

description.de:
Als sich vor zehn Jahren das „Gate“ öffnete und unsere Welt sich mit der von Monstern verband, erhielten einige normale Menschen die Macht, diese Monster zu jagen. Sie sind als die „Hunter“ bekannt. Doch nicht alle Hunter sind mächtig. Mein Name ist Jin-Woo Sung, ich bin ein Hunter mit Rang E. Ich bin ein Hunter, der selbst in den einfachsten Dungeons sein Leben riskieren muss, der „weltschwächste“. Da ich keine einzige, hervorstechende Fähigkeit habe, schaffte ich es kaum, das nötige Geld für den Zutritt zu den schwächsten Dungeons zu verdienen … jedenfalls, bis ich in einem Rang D Dungeon einen versteckten Dungeon mit der höchstmöglichen Schwierigkeit fand! Als ich dort letztendlich meinen Tod akzeptiert hatte, erhielt ich eine seltsame Macht, einen Questlog, den nur ich sehen konnte, ein Geheimnis, mit dem ich mein Level steigern konnte! Wenn ich die Quests erfülle und basierend auf den gestellten Aufgaben trainiere und Monster jage, steigt mein Level. Ich werde vom weltschwächsten Hunter zum stärksten Rang S Hunter! 


- [Book <German Edition>](https://altraverse.de/manga/solo-leveling/)

- [<German Edition>](https://altraverse.de/manga/solo-leveling/)
description.en:
10 years ago, after “the Gate” that connected the real world with the monster world opened, some of the ordinary, everyday people received the power to hunt monsters within the Gate. They are known as “Hunters”. However, not all Hunters are powerful. My name is Sung Jin-Woo, an E-rank Hunter. I’m someone who has to risk his life in the lowliest of dungeons, the “World’s Weakest”. Having no skills whatsoever to display, I barely earned the required money by fighting in low-leveled dungeons… at least until I found a hidden dungeon with the hardest difficulty within the D-rank dungeons! In the end, as I was accepting death, I suddenly received a strange power, a quest log that only I could see, a secret to leveling up that only I know about! If I trained in accordance with my quests and hunted monsters, my level would rise. Changing from the weakest Hunter to the strongest S-rank Hunter!

---

La solution ? Les chasseurs ! Ces combattants intrépides n’hésitent pas à foncer au cœur des donjons dimensionnels pour combattre les créatures qu’ils abritent, et y collecter des trésors.

description.id:
Dunia diserang monster! Muncullah "hunter" untuk menyerang monster-monster itu. Di kalangan hunter, ada yang disebut hunter terlemah di dunia. Itulah julukan Seong Jinwoo. Masuk rumah sakit adalah kebiasaannya setelah masuk ke dungeon. Suatu hari, saat melakukan raid, suatu peristiwa tragis menimpanya. Peristiwa itu hampir merenggut nyawanya. Namun, saat tersadar, dia mendapati dirinya masih hidup dan melihat sesuatu yang tidak bisa dilihat orang lain. Sejak saat itu, kehidupan Seong Jinwoo berubah. Inilah perjalanan Seong Jinwoo untuk menjadi hunter terkuat di dunia!

description.it:
10 anni fa, dopo l'apertura di “Portali” che connettono il mondo reale con quello dei mostri, gente comune ha ricevuto il potere di cacciare i mostri all'interno dei Portali. Sono conosciuti come "Hunter". Tuttavia, non tutti gli Hunter sono potenti. Il mio nome è Sung Jin-Woo, un Hunter di grado E, il "più debole al mondo". Senza particolari abilità a mia disposizione, guadagno la mia paga combattendo in dungeon di basso livello… Almeno finché non ho trovato un dungeon della massima difficoltà nascosto in un dungeon di grado D! Alla fine, mentre mi accingevo ad accettare la morte, ho ricevuto uno strano potere, un'interfaccia per le missioni che solo io posso vedere, un segreto per aumentare di livello di cui solo io sono a conoscenza! La trasformazione dal più debole al più forte Hunter di grado S!

description.ja:
十数年前、異次元と現世界を結ぶ通路”ゲート”というものが現れてからハンターと呼ばれる覚醒者たちが出現した。 ハンターはゲート内のダンジョンに潜むモンスターを倒し対価を得る人たちだ。しかし全てのハンターが強者とは限らない。 人類最弱兵器と呼ばれるE級ハンター「水篠　旬」 母親の病院代を稼ぐため嫌々ながらハンターを続けている。 ある日、D級ダンジョンに隠された高難易度の二重ダンジョンに遭遇した「旬」は死の直前に特別な能力を授かる。 「旬」にだけ見えるデイリークエストウィンドウ…！？ 「旬」ひとりだけが知ってるレベルアップの秘密… 毎日届くクエストをクリアし、モンスターを倒せばレベルアップする…！？ 果たして「旬」ひとりのレベルアップはどこまで続くのかーー！！

description.ko:
10여 년 전, 
다른 차원과 이쪽 세계를 이어 주는 통로 ‘게이트’가 열리고 
평범한 이들 중 각성한 자들이 생겨났다.

게이트 안의 던전에서 마물을 사냥하는 각성자.
그들을 일컬어 ‘헌터’라 부른다.

그러나 모든 헌터가 강한 것은 아니다.

내 이름은 성진우.
E급 헌터다. 

저급 던전에서조차 죽을 고비를 넘겨야 하는
‘인류 최약병기’. 

무엇 하나 내세울 것 없는 형편에
저급 던전으로 근근이 생계를 이어가던 그는,
D급 던전 속에 숨겨진 
최악의 난이도의 이중 던전을 만난다.

그리고 결국… 죽음을 맞이하려던 순간,
그는 기이한 능력을 얻게 된다. 

오직 그에게만 보이는 게임 퀘스트 창!
오직 그만이 알게 된 레벨 업의 비밀!

퀘스트를 따라 수련하고
몬스터를 사냥하면 레벨이 오른다.
오직 그 혼자만! 


최약체 헌터에서 최강 헌터로 각성하다!

추공 작가의 인기 판무 소설 <나 혼자만 레벨업>이
웹툰으로 드디어 등장!

description.pl:
Dziesięć lat temu otworzyły się wrota łączące inne światy z naszym. Krótko po tym pojawili się Łowcy, osoby dysponujące mocą by móc walczyć wewnątrz wrót. Historia nasza skupia się na Sung Jin-woo, który jest łowcą rangi-E, nazywanym najsłabszym łowcą. Po incydencie z podwójnym lochem będąc bliskim śmierci zyskuje on nadludzką siłę i jako jedyny może zdobywać doświadczenie by stać się silniejszym. Od najsłabszego do najsilniejszego.

description.ru:
10 лет назад, после того, как открылись «Врата», соединившие реальный мир с параллельным, некоторые из людей получили силу охотиться на монстров внутри «Врат». Они известны как «Охотники». Однако не все Охотники сильные. Меня зовут Сун Джин-Ву, охотник E-ранга. Я тот, кто рискует своей жизнью в самых низких уровнях подземелья. Не имея никаких сверхсильных навыков, я едва зарабатывал необходимые деньги, сражаясь в низкоуровневых подземельях... по крайней мере, пока я не нашел скрытое подземелье с самыми трудными проблемами в подземельях D-ранга! В конце концов, когда я чуть не умер, я внезапно получил странную силу, журнал квестов, который мог видеть только я, секрет для поднятия уровня, о котором знаю только я! Если я тренировался в соответствии с моими квестами и охотился на монстров, то мой уровень повышался. Переход от самого слабого Охотника к самому сильному, Охотнику S-ранга!

description.th:
10 ปีก่อน 'เกต' ที่พาทะลุสู่อีกมิติหนึ่งได้เปิดขึ้น ภายในเกตมีมอนสเตอร์ตัวร้ายที่เหล่าผู้คนที่ถูกปลุกพลังจะต้องกำราบ 
คนเหล่านั้นได้รับการขนานนามว่า 'ฮันเตอร์' แต่ทว่า ไม่ใช่ฮันเตอร์ทุกคนที่จะแข็งแกร่ง
ซองจินอู ผู้ได้รับฉายาว่าเป็นอาวุธที่กากที่สุดในมวลมนุษยชาติ คือฮันเตอร์แรงค์ E ที่แม้กระทั่งในดันเจี้ยนแรงค์ต่ำๆ ชีวิตเขาก็ยังแขวนบนเส้นด้าย
แต่หลังจากที่ได้เข้าไปในดับเบิลดันเจี้ยนและรอดชีวิตกลับมา เขาก็เปลี่ยนไป
จากฮันเตอร์ที่กากที่สุด เขาจะกลายเป็นผู้ที่แกร่งที่สุด!

description.es-la: Sung Jinwoo es un cazador de rango E, considerado como el nivel más bajo dentro de la Asociación de cazadores, por lo que se le conoce como “El cazador más débil”. Día tras día pone en peligro su vida y se embarca en misiones del rango más bajo para poder sufragar los gastos de su madre enferma; sin embargo, en una de esas misiones, lo que en un principio parecía un raid de rango D termina por ser una mazmorra de un nivel inusitado y las cosas empiezan a torcerse… ¿Lograrán Sung y sus compañeros salir con vida?
description.pt-br:
Dez anos atrás, depois do "Portal" que conecta o mundo real com um mundo de montros se abriu, algumas pessoas comuns receberam o poder de caçar os monstros do portal. Eles são conhecidos como caçadores. Porém, nem todos os caçadores são fortes. Meu nome é Sung Jin-Woo, um caçador de rank E. Eu sou alguém que tem que arriscar a própria vida nas dungeons mais fracas, "O mais fraco do mundo". Sem ter nenhuma habilidade à disposição, eu mal consigo dinheiro nas dungeons de baixo nível… Ao menos até eu encontrar uma dungeon escondida com a maior dificuldade dentro do Rank D! No fim, enquanto aceitava minha morte, eu ganhei um novo poder…

連接異次元與這個世界的通道「傳送門」，

altTitles.zh-ro: Yingdi Ta Ying Yao Dang Wo Jin Zhu

description.en: A gold mentalist paparazzi exposes pictures of Lin Chu privately meeting with his sponsor late at night. After getting into a car accident, he entered the body of the center of gossip, Lin Chu. And, his mysterious sponsor is suspected to be the cold and ruthless movie star Li Yu, who doesn't seem to get along with Lin Chu?! What's even more shocking is that it seems Lin Chu... Has more than one sponsor?!

Julia Green is a teenager who lives in California alone. When she was feeling her loneliest, she unexpectedly encounters an unknown yet strikingly beautiful boy in her closet. Following that incident, whenever she was going through a rough time, William magically appears in her closet. For example, when she spent her birthday alone, on the night of a dance party she has to go to unaccompanied, or having to spend a sad dawn, he appears. Julia naturally ends up falling for William, who stood by her side in every tough moment... A magical love story that transcends time and space, where they have to fight to stand by each other.

altTitles.en: Tokoshie x Bullet - The Battle at Shin Minato
Tokoshie×Bullet The Battle at Shin Minato

altTitles.ja: 永久×バレット 新湊攻防戦
永久×バレット: 新湊攻防戦

description.en: In this story, unidentified giant weapons will destroy the world's metropolises in 2029. The masterminds of this unprecedented destruction are known as "Tokoshie". They call themselves weapons when they go out on the streets of the cities with their overwhelming powers and disappear as soon as they are done with them. A decade has passed since then. A certain military company is developing a combat drone with the ability to fight the Tokoshie, and a certain millionaire figure goes underground to discover the secret of the Tokoshie's eternal life. Another specific girl goes on a journey to fight the Tokoshie, sworn in as her parents' enemies. In short, this is the chronicle of an endless struggle between humanity and its greatest enemy ever.
description.pt-br:
Nesta história, armas gigantes não identificadas destruíram as grandes cidades do mundo em 2030. Os mentores dessa destruição sem precedentes são conhecidos como “Tokoshie”. Eles se autodenominam armas quando saem para as ruas das cidades com seus poderes avassaladores e desaparecem assim que as destroem. Quase uma década se passa desde então. Uma certa companhia militar está desenvolvendo um drone de combate com habilidade para lutar contra os Tokoshie, e uma certa figura milionária parte em uma jornada subterrânea para descobrir o segredo da vida eterna deles. Outra garota específica parte em uma jornada para lutar contra os Tokoshie, declarados inimigos de seus pais. Em suma, esta é a crônica de uma luta sem limites entre a humanidade e seu maior inimigo de todos os tempos.

altTitles.ja: やんちゃギャルの安城さん

altTitles.th: คุณอันโจ หยอกนักเพราะรักนะ

description.de:
Seto ist ein total normaler und irgendwie langweiliger Schüler. Aus einem unerklärlichen Grund jedoch, lässt seine Mitschülerin Anjou ihn nicht in Ruhe! Der ernste Seto und die energische Anjou bilden ein kontrastreiches Duo, doch Anjou macht das nichts aus, da sie sehr viel Spaß hat, Seto zu necken. Andererseits hat Seto eine schwere Zeit mit Anjous Eskapaden. Wenn er doch nur wüsste, dass seine Reaktionen der Grund sind, dass Anjou weitermacht.  
  
Doch … ist ihr flirten wirklich nur gespielt …?
description.en:
Seto is a completely ordinary and somewhat boring high school student. Yet, for whatever reason, his errant gyaru classmate Anjou just won't leave him alone! The serious Seto and energetic Anjou make a contrasting duo, but Anjou doesn't seem to mind, as she has too much fun teasing him. On the other hand, Seto has a hard time dealing with all of her endless antics; little does he realize that his humorous reactions are precisely the reason Anjou enjoys his company.

But… just how much of her flirting is merely an act?
description.fr: Seto est un lycéen ne souhaitant qu'une chose : passer sa scolarité sans être remarqué et être en paix. Malheureusement pour lui, il attire l'attention de la pire personne possible dans sa classe, Anjou la gal. A partir de ce jour, le quotidien de Seto va drastiquement changer grâce (ou à cause) de sa camarade, cherchant à s'amuser au dépend de notre héros.
description.ja: 真面目でクラスの中でも目立たない瀬戸くんには、なぜかいつもイケてるギャルの安城さんがいちいちエロく絡んでくる。いつもギリギリでドキドキする思春期ぴちぴちラブコメディ！
description.ru: Сето - серьёзный старшеклассник, который вел тихую школьную жизнь, пока не стал жертвой дразнилок гяру Андзё-сан.
description.pt-br:
Seto é um estudante completamente comum e um tanto chato. Mesmo assim, por alguma razão, sua nada correta colega de classe Gal Anjou simplesmente não o deixa em paz!

O Seto sério e a enérgica Anjou formam uma dupla um tanto interessante, mas Anjou não parece se importar, pois se diverte muito provocando-o. Por outro lado, Seto tem dificuldade em lidar com todas as suas travessuras intermináveis; mal ele percebe que suas reações humorísticas são precisamente o motivo pelo qual Anjou gosta de sua companhia.

Mas… quanto de seu flerte é meramente uma atuação?

altTitles.ja: ギャル嫁の秘密

description.en: Fuyuki is a beautiful and cool gal! But there's a secret side of her that she only shows in front of her husband...? A cute love comedy with a gal wife!
description.ja:
冬雪（ふゆき）は美人でクールなギャル！でも「旦那」の前だけ見せる秘密の姿があって……？SNS累計37万いいね！の可愛い「ギャル嫁」とのラブコメディ！
 
--- 
 
Fuyuyuki (Fuyuki) wa bijin de kūruna gyaru! Demo "dan'na" no mae dake miseru himitsu no sugata ga atte...? SNS ruikei 37 man ī ne! No kawaii "gyaru yome" to no rabukomedi!
description.es-la: ¡Fuyuki es una hermosa y atractiva gal! ¿Pero hay una parte de ella que solo le muestra a su esposo y mantiene en secreto del resto? Una linda comedia romántica con una esposa que es una gal.
description.pt-br: Fuyuki é uma linda gyaru! Mas tem um lado secreto que ela só mostra para o seu marido? Uma comédia romântica fofa com uma esposa gyaru!

title.en: Gambling Outcast Kaiji: The One Poker Arc - Kaiji Part 5

altTitles.ja: 賭博堕天録 カイジ ワン・ポーカー編

description.en: After adding Chang and Mario, whose lives he saved in the Salvation Game, to his team, Kaiji arrives at the Teiai warehouse to face off with Kazuya, the son of Teiai Group Chairman Hyoudou. Kazuya begins to explain "One Poker," a gambling game where players play a single card on a machine called "Mother Sophie." Kaiji is stunned by Kazuya's proposal of "one bet of 200 million = one life." The ultimate death match, a gambling game that goes beyond the norm, is about to begin!
description.ru:
После «Спасительной игры» и маджонга «Семнадцать шагов» Кайдзи Ито, имея на руках 400 000 000 йен, решается сыграть в ещё одну игру под названием «Ван Покер» с Кадзуей Хёдо. Кадзуя ставит два миллиарда йен! За кем же будет победа?

(Source: readmanga)

altTitles.ja: 星方武侠アウトロースター

description.en: Space is mainly inhabited by three different groups: the Federation, which is the real government; Various pirate clans, which use special techniques and magic to dominate the frontier; and the outlaws which are just about everywhere in between. There are also various alien races and empires which sort of fall within this category.It is on this frontier where Gene Starwind and his 11-year old partner Jim Hawking, freelance bounty hunters and odd-job takers extraordinaire, live and work. Until they happen to take a job from a mysterious woman named Hilda. In no time flat they`re up to their ears in pirates…

altTitles.ja: お兄ちゃんはおしまい!

description.en:
Mahiro Oyama was just a normal erotic-game loving dude...until he woke up one morning as a woman! Turns out his mad-scientist little sister, Mihari, tried out one of her new experiments on him...with a disastrous outcome, as far as Mahiro's concerned! But Mihari is as determined to study him as he is determined to go back to his shut-in, game-playing life, and one thing's for sure...life is going to get a whole lot weirder from here on out!

*5th place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga  
  
- **Retail:** (Direct Retail From the Mangaka)

description.pt-br: Oyama Mahiro, um dia acordou como uma garota graças a sua irmã que colocou uma droga em sua comida, após ter visto eroges a noite toda. Um mangá de comédia sobre um garoto que se transformou em uma mulher.

title.en: The Secrets of the Lovely Duchess

description.en:
Luclia is a girl who was trapped in the demon archduke's dungeon for seven years and saw ghosts. One day the prison wall collapsed and a man came.

"Wow! are you a prince?"
"Sorry, I'm just a duke."

Davier, Duke of the House of Montenfeltro. Sure enough, with his temperamental and violent personality, he would take Luclia, an unknown girl, as his princess?!

"Duke, I wonder why you brought her here..."

Luclia, who has just entered the word with the mysterious Duke Davier. Can two people understand each other and still be happy?

title.en: Amateur E-girl Streaming a Space War

altTitles.ja-ro: Teihen Chūbā ga Uchū Sensō o Totte Mita
Teihen Tuber ga Uchuu Sensou wo Tottemita

altTitles.ja: 底辺チューバーが宇宙戦争を撮ってみた

description.en:
On a day just like any other, a giant spaceship suddenly appeared and invaded Earth, obliterating entire cities in the blink of an eye. In the midst of the attacks, Kanna Fujimiya, amateur content creator, rose to fame overnight with her video coverage of the invasion. With her newfound popularity and charms, Kanna continues to cover the war from the front lines, but…!?  
  
This amateur content creator reveals the truth behind the interstellar war in this science fiction thriller!

title.en: The Ranker's Guide to Live an Ordinary Life

altTitles.en: A Guide to the Right Life for Rankers

description.en:
The first S-class Awakened is really a third-rate student?!

In the 21st century, the world became a 'fantasy'. In a South Korea filled with despair, S-classes have descended! The greatest of them - Witch Queen Jyo!

"Goddess Jyo... Queen Jyo... Who are you...? Who could it be?"

The true identity of the savior who has been shrouded in mystery for 10 years. Her identity? Gyung Jyo, a third-rate student, who's unable to make outgoing calls due to her mother's anger.and on the verge of being strangled and trapped in the abyss.

She was leading a peaceful and ordinary life as Korea's top unemployed person, however...

[The rankings are being updated.]
[Your current ranking has dropped to 2nd place.] 

"!?"

"I know who you are, Witch Queen."

Baek Dohyun, a regressor, appears in front of Gyung Jyo!

Will Gyung Jyo, an S-class Munchkin ranker, be able to maintain her comfortable and lazy tyrant life, as her well-rolling life turns upside down into the position of the world's savior?

altTitles.ja: 狼くんの隠しゴト

altTitles.vi: Bí mật của cậu người sói

description.en:
Humans have evolved to be born with the "attributes" of animals.
Misako, a mere human who does not possess any attributes, meets a black wolf belonging to the genus "Hailo wolf" at the Juusaki Academy where she is enrolled. The two have nothing in common, but they find themselves becoming aware of each other...⁉

A clumsy and straightforward beastly coming-of-age story.
description.vi:
Con người đã tiến hoá vì đã đạt được năng lực từ "Thuộc tính" của động vật.
Misako, một con người bình thường không có năng lực từ thuộc tính đã gặp gỡ một cậu sói đen thuộc  loài sói xám tại Học Viện Cấp 3 Juusaki. Mặc dù cả hai không có điểm gì giống nhau, nhưng họ dần ý thức được sự tồn tại của nhau... Một câu chuyện thanh xuân vụng về nhưng chân thật của loài thú.

description.en: My bias is the City God! It's a story about how a non mainstream boy with unfortunate genetics causes all sorts of trouble in a peaceful city while chasing after the City God... "It doesn't matter if they're a ghost or a monster, nothing can stop my bias Xuming God! Not even the God himself!"

As the monster slayer troops, also known as 'Sretu', no longer functioned as it used to, humans became monster feed.
'Jin Cheongdo', who has been living in a world full of monsters for his entire life, uses a legendary item 'Midwood', to turn back in time, for the sake of killing 'Ian' who was the centerpiece of this whole mess...
description.ko:
괴물처치부대 '스레투'가 사라진 지금. 인간들은 괴물들의 먹이가 되었다.
괴물이 가득한 세상에서 평생을 살아온 '진청도'는
전설의 아이템 '미드우트'를 이용해 과거로 가서
이 사태를 초래한 '이안'을 죽이려 하는데...

altTitles.en: Ended Up Living with a Classmate

altTitles.ja-ro: Classmate to Issho ni Sumu Koto ni Natte shimatta

altTitles.ja: クラスメイトと一緒に住むことになってしまった
よもやまこばなし

description.en: It's a collection of short manga stories about interacting with a girl, sometimes romantically and sometimes not.
A collection of stories between two boys when they were still students.

Milia, the great witch who has reached the pinnacle of evil, has fallen in love for the first time... with her arch nemesis "The Hero"?! She has the highest magical power, but her experience in love is nil. Now the witch begins her quest to discover more of this "Love" in this romantic comedy!

title.en: No Way I'll Go into the Cornfield With You!

description.en:
Jiang Lieyang, a spoiled rich kid  who was born in the Jiangnan region, was deceived by his own mother and sent to the Dongbei countryside. Where the mysterious local resident Xun Zao became Jiang Lieyang’s “acting guardian”

Not being used to the living habits and the difference in local customs make the pampered Jiang Lieyang want to escape, but he couldn't help but getting closer and closer to Xun Zao...

title.en: Otoko Girai na Bijin Shimai wo Namae mo Tsugezu ni Tasuketara Ittai Dounaru?

altTitles.ja: 男嫌いな美人姉妹を名前も告げずに助けたら一体どうなる?

altTitles.en: What Happens When You Save Two Beautiful Sisters Who Hate Men Without Telling Them Your Name?
The Case About Two Sisters Becoming Extremely Obsessed With Me After I Saved Them

altTitles.es-la: El caso de dos hermanas que se obsesionaron conmigo después de que las salvara

description.en:
Arisa and Aina are beautiful sisters who are famous for their dislike of men. Hayato, a classmate who happened to be involved with the two, will receive "special treatment" from the girls who are supposed to hate men―?! 

"I want to be a slave to Hayato-sama..."
"I want to fall in love and conceive his child."

The long-awaited comicalization of the unpredictable rich romantic comedy has started!
description.ja:
男嫌いで有名な同級生の美人姉妹、亜利沙（ありさ）と藍那（あいな）。
ひょんなことから2人に関わることになった隼人（はやと）は、
男嫌いのはずの彼女たちから"特別扱い"を受けることにーー⁉︎
「隼人様に隷属したいの…」
「愛し合って彼の子供を孕みたいーー」
予測不能な濃厚ラブコメ、待望のコミカライズがスタート！
description.es-la: Arisa y Aina son unas hermosas compañeras de clase famosas por su aversión a los hombres. ¿¡Hayato, que se ha liado con ellas, recibirá un "trato especial" por parte de las chicas que se supone que odian a los hombres...?! ""Quiero ser esclava de Hayato-sama..."" Quiero enamorarme y concebir a su hijo"". ¡La tan esperada comicalización de la impredecible y rica comedia romántica ha comenzado!

altTitles.th: ยุคแห่งยอดมนุษย์

altTitles.ja: 超人の時代

description.en:
Unknown monsters have appeared on Earth, alongside ‘Superhumans’ who appear to dispatch them. With these mysterious monsters and superhumans, a new ‘Superhuman Era’ begins!

지구에 근원 모를 괴물들이 출현하고
그들을 제압하는 '초인'들 또한 등장한다.

description.ru: Если бы кто-то сказал, что «Супермен» действительно существует в этом мире, вы бы поверили? Каждый раз, когда появляется монстр, студент, или, по крайней мере, выглядит как учащийся, обладающий сверхспособностями, - убивает чудище. Но... кто именно этот герой? И откуда появились эти "другие"?
description.th:
จู่ ๆ โลกของเราก็มีมอนสเตอร์กำเนิดขึ้น ไม่มีใครรู้ว่าพวกมันมาจากไหน แต่การปรากฏของพวกมันมาพร้อมกับพลังเหนือมนุษย์ในผู้คนเช่นกัน มนุษย์เหล่านั้นจึงใช้พลังปกป้องโลกเพื่อสร้างสันติสุข ...ใช่แล้ว นี่คือเรื่องราวของ "ยุคแห่งยอดมนุษย์" นั่นเอง

紧急警报！怪物肆虐！
硬核少年超人拯救人类！
男主林江平时在学校里只是一个普通的学生，但这个看似平凡的男孩却肩负着重大的责任——拯救地球！因为他是一个拥有超能力的“超人”。林江和他的搭档们能否成功抵御异人种的威胁？地球又会面临怎样的命运?一场惊险刺激的地球守卫战即将上演！

地球上出現了不知從哪冒出來的怪物，為了擊滅這些怪物，「超人」出現了。來路不明的怪物和超人，正好締造出了「超人時代」。

description.en:
JaeSin was turned into an insignificant small creature and ousted to the human world for violating the law of causality and the only way he can go back to the underworld is to win a human’s love. He doesn’t believe in human emotions until he bumped into a crown prince, Nok, who’s been suffering from heartbreak for a long time. He then started getting curious about him…

“There you are. A fool with unrequited love.”
description.pl: Jako syn króla Yeomra z podziemnego świata, Jaeshin prowadził hedonistyczne życie pełne ciągle zmieniających się partnerów łóżkowych i protekcjonalności wobec ludzi. Pewnego dnia jednak przekracza granicę i zostaje ukarany w dość nietypowy sposób: w dzień staje się bezsilnym szczeniakiem, a w nocy człowiekiem. Jedynym sposobem na uniknięcie kary jest zdobycie ludzkiego serca, co nie będzie łatwe... zwłaszcza, gdy człowiekiem, na którego zwrócił uwagę, jest słodki książę Lee Nok. Czy Jaeshin zdobędzie księcia? A może to Jaeshin zostanie zdobyty?
description.uk: Ча Шин, котрий був вигнаним з власного світу за вчинення злочину, котрий порушив порядок життя та смерті. Його єдиний спосіб повернутись назад в підземний світ - завоювати людське серце. Перед Ча Шином, який не вірить у людську великодушність, постає спадкоємний принц Нок, у котрого розбите серце через невзаємне кохання. Демон починає цікавитись Ноком... Цікавий початок... Що ж буде далі?
description.es-la: Jae-shin, quien se convirtió en un criminal y fue expulsado de este mundo. Su única forma de regresar al inframundo es obteniendo un corazón humano. Frente a Jae-shin, que no cree en las emociones humanas, aparece el príncipe heredero Nok, que tiene un problema del corazón desde hace mucho tiempo, Jae-shin comienza a sentir curiosidad por la situación de Nok. "Hay un idiota que alberga un amor que no se puede cumplir.”

altTitles.ja: ファンタスマゴリア・デイズ

description.en:
Follow the daily life and adventures of Dr. Hoop and his assistant, the robot Lancelot, across the planet Phantasmagoria in these short stories brimming with all sorts of peculiar characters. Experience the unique warmth and creativity Tamura Shigeru has to offer in this nostalgic world of his creation - infused with a touch of both humor and sadness.

---
More exploration of the world of Phantasmagoria, created after Tamura's short animation featuring scenes from the same world: **a piece of PHANTASMAGORIA**.

Yue Ling and Chong Yao are both trained under Tai Shang Xian Jun, they get along really well until Chong Yao inherited the throne of the Emperor. Everything seems to have changed since then... 
Vicious but loyal Emperor X Gentle water god.
description.zh: 月凌和重耀共同拜在太上仙君门下，师兄师弟一直相处和谐，直到重耀继承天帝之位，一切都好像变了……腹黑忠犬天帝X温柔清冷水神。

altTitles.ja: 嘘喰い

description.en:
There are gamblers out there who even bet their lives as ante. But to secure the integrity of these life-threatening gambles, a violent and powerful organization by the name of “Kakerou” referees these games as a neutral party. Follow Baku Madarame a.k.a. Usogui (The Lie Eater) as he gambles against maniacal opponents at games – such as Escape the Abandoned Building, Old Maid, and Hangman – to ultimately “out-gamble” and control the neutral organization of Kakerou itself.  


---

**Links:**  
- [OAV on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=14163)
description.ru:
Есть игроки, которые ставят на кон свою жизнь. Чтобы сохранить целостность таких смертельно-опасных игр, жестокая и могущественная организация «Кагэро» судит их, как нейтральная сторона.
Наш герой — Баку Мадарамэ, «Пожиратель лжи». Игрок, чья цель — переиграть и в конце взять под контроль саму нейтральную организацию «Кагэро».

---

(Source: [readmanga](https://mintmanga.live/pojiratel_lji))
description.es-la: Hay jugadores que incluso apuestan su vida como apuesta. Pero para asegurar la integridad de estas apuestas que ponen en peligro la vida, una violenta y poderosa organización llamada "Kakerou" arbitra estos juegos como parte neutral. Sigue a Baku Madarame, también conocido como Usogui (El Devorador de Mentiras), mientras se enfrenta a oponentes maníacos en juegos como "Escapar del Edificio Abandonado", "La Vieja Doncella" y "El Ahorcado", para acabar jugando más que la propia organización neutral de Kakerou

altTitles.ja: かさねと昴

description.en: Both of them are straightforward people. Once they meet, they quickly get to know each other better. A heartwarming romantic comedy that begins with a certain incident. Shibata Kasane, a graphics designer at a toy design and development company, is troubled. Her troubles started when she grabbed her colleague Enokida Subaru's ass by accident! Kasane was intrigued by how similar Enokida's ass and her favourite childhood character felt. At the same time, Kasane felt guilty because Enokida might have been uncomfortable. Enokida said "I don't mind" but had a pained and frightened expression. Kasane was overcome by the urge to apologise profusely! On the other hand, it looks like Enokida is hiding something.
description.ru: Касанэ Сибата работает графическим дизайнером в компании, выпускающей детские игрушки. Однажды она случайно... дотронулась до ягодиц своего коллеги, Субару Энокиды, и это напомнило ей о любимом персонаже из детства. Касанэ хочет извиниться перед Субару, не подозревая, что он скрывает...

altTitles.es: La hija más querida del villano

altTitles.th: บุตรสาวผู้ล้ำค่าของวายร้าย

altTitles.ja: 悪党公爵の愛娘

altTitles.vi: Đứa Con Gái Quý Giá Của Nhân Vật Phản Diện
Cô Công Chúa Nhỏ Của Kẻ Phản Diện

description.en:
My name is Rosaria von Valencia, but I didn't always have this name. According to a book I read, I'm supposed to be murdered in place of the saint, Cordelia, just because I look like her. I decided to run away to avoid ever meeting my future killer, Duke Valencia, but ended up running into him as he was on the brink of death. After I saved him in the hopes of being spared, he adopted me as his daughter! Now that my new dad's spoiling me with love, does this mean I'll get to live until the end?

---
It's already unfair that I suffered greatly because I closely resembled the saint, but why did the villain kill me without any mercy at all? No, actually, it said in the book that I was really bound to die. 'My life is already ruined. Of all things, why do I have to be the one to die a ridiculous death?' There's still hope! I haven't met any of the characters yet so I'll just run away! But why did the villain collapse in front of me...?

With a lot of effort, I barely saved the life of the villain who was on the brink of death. But now he's saying that he wanted to adopt me as his daughter and raise me to be a saint?! Just like that, I decided to become his daughter for a few days before leaving quietly.

"My daughter is a genius. There's no child who is more angelic in this world other than my daughter."

...I think I have coaxed my dad too well. Even the guys who originally followed the real saint started to pay attention to me. What went wrong? Aren't you guys supposed to hate me?!

---

description.es:
Ya es injusto que sufrí mucho porque me parezco mucho a la Santa, pero ¿por qué el villano me mató sin piedad?No, en realidad, decía en el libro que estaba destinado a morir.'Mi vida ya está arruinada. De todas las cosas, ¿por qué tengo que ser yo quien tenga una muerte ridícula?¡Todavía hay esperanza! Todavía no he conocido a ninguno de los personajes, ¡así que me escaparé!Pero, ¿por qué el villano colapsó frente a mí...?Con mucho esfuerzo, apenas salvé la vida del villano que estaba al borde de la muerte.¡¿Pero ahora dice que quería adoptarme como su hija y criarme para ser una Santa?!Así como así, decidí convertirme en su hija por unos días antes de irme en silencio.—Mi hija es un genio. No hay niña más angelical en este mundo que mi hija.…Creo que he engatusado a mi padre demasiado bien.Incluso los chicos que originalmente seguían a la verdadera Santa empezaron a prestarme atención.¿Qué salió mal? ¡¿No se supone que ustedes me odian?!

---

description.id:
Namaku Cordelia, sama seperti nama saintess yang parasnya juga mirip sekali denganku. Menurut buku yang aku baca, di masa depan nanti aku akan mati di tangan seorang duke yang salah mengiraku sebagai saintess. Aku bermaksud untuk kabur dari takdir itu, tapi aku malah bertemu dengan sang duke jahat dan dia mengangkatku sebagai anaknya! "Tidak masalah kan kalau aku jadi anak angkatnya sebentar?" Apakah aku akan bernasib sama isi buku itu? Omong-omong, aku baca di mana ya buku itu?

---

description.ko:
성녀와 닮았다는 이유로 납치당한 것도 억울한데
악당은 가차 없이 나를 죽였다.

아니, 그렇게 죽을 거라고 책에 쓰여 있었다.

‘이번 생은 망했어. 하필이면 어이없이 죽는 역할이야?’

아직 희망은 있었다.
등장인물들과 아무도 만나지 않은 지금, 도망쳐야 한다!
그런데 왜 악당이 내 앞에 쓰러져 있지……?

죽을 고비에서 겨우 악당을 구했더니
이젠 그가 성녀가 될 재목이라며 나를 딸로 입양했다?!
기왕 이렇게 된 거, 며칠 딸 노릇 하다가 조용히 떠나려고 했는데

“내 딸은 천재다. 내 딸처럼 천사 같은 아이는 이 세상에 없지.”

……아빠를 너무 잘 꼬셔 버린 것 같다.

심지어 진짜 성녀를 따라다니던 남자들도 내게 관심을 갖기 시작했다.

왜 이래? 나 너희들 싫거든?!

---

description.ru:
Я знала, что моя судьба быть похищенной и убитой потому что мы со святой похожи.
Планировала сбежать до того, как снова встречусь с злым герцогом, но...
Не могу поверить, что я упала у него на глазах!
И он даже спас меня от смерти и удочерил!
Несколько дней я старалась играть в хорошего ребенка, но неожиданно герцог становился дураком, зависимый от своей дочери...

description.sk:
Volám sa Rosaria von Valencia, ale nie vždy som sa tak volala. Podľa knihy, ktorú som čítala, ma mali zavraždiť namiesto svätice Cordelie len preto, že sa na ňu podobám. Rozhodla som sa utiecť, aby som sa nikdy nestretla so svojím budúcim vrahom, vojvodom Valenciom, ale nakoniec som naňho narazila, keď bol na pokraji smrti. Po tom, čo som ho zachránila v nádeji, že ma v budúcnosti ušetrí, si ma adoptoval za svoju dcéru! Teraz, keď ma môj nový otec rozmaznáva láskou, znamená to, že budem žiť až do konca?

description.vi:
Vì gần giống với Thánh nữ mà chịu nhiều đau khổ, đã là rất bất công rồi, nhưng sao nhân vật phản diện lại xuống tay với mình không một chút thương sót chứ?

Không, thật ra, ở trong sách, mình sẽ chết như vậy.

“Cuộc đời mình bị huỷ hoại cả rồi. Sau tất cả, sao mình lại phải chịu một cái chết lố bịch như vậy chứ?”

Mình vẫn còn cơ hội! Mình vẫn chưa chạm mặt bất kì nhân vật nào nên mình sẽ bỏ chạy!

Nhưng sao nhân vật phản diện lại đổ gục trước mắt mình…?

Mình đã rất cố gắng để cứu sống nhân vật phản diện đang cận kề cái chết.

Nhưng anh ta nói muốn nhận mình làm con gái và nuôi dạy mình trở thành Thánh nữ?!

Và như thế, mình đồng ý trở thành con gái của anh ta vài ngày trước khi lẳng lặng rời đi.

“Con gái ta là thiên tài. Không có đứa trẻ nào trên thế giới này hơn được con gái ta đâu.”…Mình nghĩ mình nịnh cha rất tốt đó.

Ngay cả những người lúc đầu đi theo vị Thánh nữ thật cũng bắt đầu để ý đến mình.

Chuyện gì đây? Chẳng phải họ ghét mình á?

altTitles.ja: ロックマンさん

description.ar: بعد انتهاء القتال مع وايلي روكمان يخوض معركة جديدة كطبيب اسنان في العالم الحقيقي
description.en: Much time has passed since his battle with Dr. Wily, and Rockman has grown up in a peaceful world. Working as a dentist at the dental clinic opened by Dr. Right, Rockman struggles in his daily life with the allies he once fought with!

altTitles.ja: ぐだぐだ太閤伝ZIPANG

description.en: GUDAGUDA Taikou Legend ZIPANG (ぐだぐだ太閤伝ZIPANG) is a manga written and illustrated by Keikenchi, serialized on the magazine Comptiq and the web magazine TYPE-MOON Comic Ace. It is a side story of Koha-Ace serialized in 2022 featuring a Holy Grail War set during the Sengoku period.
